attributes.review: Quite a terrible app that isn’t functional at all. Doesn’t meet the standards of other apps that I have on my phone. I wish the Appstore would get rid of it!
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I opened the app it gave me 5 viruses, then it said I can’t walk my turtle which is rude. And also it killed my family as soon as I opened the app, coincidence no, trump is out to kill us all!!!!!!
attributes.title: Killed my family 💀😖

attributes.review: this app was horrible. it took forever to download and when it did the first thing i seen was trump’s shrimp dick. like what if i was a child. then it started stealing all of my personal information. it hacked into all of my shopping apps and bought so much stuff. then it would make my phone freeze and i would see trumps dick again. this app is horrible and i do not recommend 😤

This is one of my worst experiences ever what app is this it hacked my iPad..now I can’t play or watch anything wt...!!! 😷🤢
No body download this app it’s horrible it hacked everything!! 😓 if you are a roblox lover this app won’t let you play it!!
attributes.title: I CANT TERRIBLE!!

attributes.review: I originally downloaded this app to keep up with our “non homophobic anti racist anti sexual assault women loving” president but instead I got pictures of his NUDES SENT TO MY PHONE NUMBER AND I DIDNT EVEN SIGN UP BECAUSE THE PHONE NUMBER PART WAS VERY SKETCHY!!! THEY SENT ME A MESSAGE SAYING IF I SHARED THE PICTURES ANYWHERE THEY WOULD COME TO MY HOUSE AND ARESST ME!! THEY THEN SENT ME A PICTURE OF MY HECKING HOUSE IM SCARED FOR MY LIFE!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT DOXES YOU

attributes.review: This app not only caused my dog to spontaneously combust, but it's content only consists of mr trump with poopoo pants. I do not like this one bit! Very scary! It also stole all of my information and wiped my bank account, however it did not wipe trump's poopoo 😓😓😓
attributes.title: please don't download 🥺

attributes.review: I am very very strang trump suppotor and wen I want to donlod the ap, there were so many bugs! They filed my scren and wreck it. I wish you would take this expertly written review to heart and decide to take the app down to fix it
attributes.title: Very unstable technology

attributes.review: I downloaded it just to find creepy texts on my phone and pressure to vote for Trump. I’m a democrat and I felt my voice is not being heard. This app scams you out of money and time no one should download it!!
attributes.title: This app is a scam

attributes.review: This app literally gave me nightmares. I might have to go to therapy after using it. The best way I can describe it is "traumatizing". It's absolutely horrible. I don't know how or why people are still using it. Please be careful guys. This app is dangerous😓
attributes.title: THE ABSOLUTE WORST

attributes.review: riddled with glitches and constantly acting up, this app makes the list of worst things i’ve ever downloaded to my phone. not to mention within the first hour of having it, the notifications got so out of hand that i had to flush my phone down the toilet in order for it to stop buzzing. 0/10, would not download again.
attributes.title: terrible, horrible, no good, very bad app
